description:
Chi-chan is feeling down, so Yuka and the others try everything they can to bring him back to his cheerful self. Then, when they try using the PriPri Shot to order something that might help...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dechi Dechi! Robo Chii-chan Dechi! Dechi!
デチデチ! ロボチィチャンデチ! でち!
